entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who couldn't believe what he was hearing. He had always thought of Fudge as a kindly figure.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is described as a short, angry wizard who refused to accept the prospect of disruption in his comfortable and ordered world.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone who could have risen.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as repeating the fact that Voldemort has returned.

relationships.description: Harry and Fudge have a disagreement about the return of Voldemort.
Dumbledore is connected to Voldemort as he mentions that Voldemort has returned.
Fudge controls Azkaban, but Dumbledore suggests removing the dementors from it.
